Text: Is this the 2nd part of the season 3 finale?? Because of the 1st three episodes, different people are listing them differently.

To clear up (I hope) the episode numbering of season 2 & 3.... FX ordered 13 episodes in the 2011/12 contract. The first 3 episodes acted as a closure/epilogue to the story-arc that made season TWO. Some people (including myself) consider these episodes as part of season 2, since they are part of the same story arc. The remaining 10 episodes of the 2012 contract made a NEW story arc and most people are numbering these as season 3, episodes 1 thru 10.
